title: Chicken liver pâté with beetroot jelly
description: A rich pâté flavoured with brandy, Maderia and port. An earthy beetroot jelly and crisp chicken skin ups the ante.  Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need six sterilised small kilner jars or small jam jars (approximately 8x7cm/4x3in), a fine conical sieve (such as a chinois), muslin, a blender and two baking trays.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water for 10 minutes
3 chicken legs, poached for 20 minutes in chicken stock
6 baby golden beetroot, cooked and peeled
